bio: Those he's Inspirited sweat up a storm. When several of these Yo-kai get together, they make for a very sticky situation!

soultimate.name: Sweaty Wall
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: Enhances the effects of guarding by 10%.
skill.name: Meat Shield

name: Swelton
